code:
stateDiagram-v2
[FinTech_PaymentGateway] --> Idle: File Opened (FinTech_FraudDetection)

    state "User Edits File" as UserAction
    Idle --> UserAction: User types a character

    state "Request Lock" as RequestLock {FinTech_LedgerService)
        }
    }

    GrantLock --> LockedState: 200 OK
    DenyLock --> ConflictState: 409 Conflict

    state "Locked (FinTech_PaymentGateway)" as LockedState {FinTech_LedgerService] --> Editing
        Editing --> Heartbeat: Every 30s
        Heartbeat --> ServerUpdate: UPDATE locks SET timestamp
        ServerUpdate --> Editing: 200 OK
        
        Editing --> Unlock: User saves/closes/stops
    }

    state "Conflict (FinTech_LedgerService)" as ConflictState {FinTech_FraudDetection] --> ShowWarning: Display "File Locked by User B"
        ShowWarning --> Idle: User cancels edit
    }

    Unlock --> Idle: DELETE /lock (FinTech_AuthVault)
    
    note right of Heartbeat
        Prevents "Stale Locks" if
        PC crashes or loses power.
    end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
